original_text: At that time, the Lord will bring justice for his people. He will forgive his servants. He will rescue them when he sees that they are weak, and very few of them remain, as slaves or free people. At that time, the Lord will bring justice for his people. He will forgive his servants. He will rescue them when he sees that they are weak, and very few of them remain, as slaves or free people. At that time, the Lord will bring justice for his people. He will forgive his servants. He will rescue them when he sees that they are weak, and very few of them remain, as slaves or free people. At that time, the Lord will bring justice for his people. He will forgive his servants. He will rescue them when he sees that they are weak, and very few of them remain, as slaves or free people. At that time, the Lord will bring justice for his people.
korean_text: 참으로 여호와께서 자기 백성을 판단하시고 그 종들을 불쌍히 여기시리니 곧 그들의 무력함과 갇힌 자나 놓인 자가 없음을 보시는 때에로다

sentences.original_text: the Lord will bring justice for his people
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그의 백성을 위해 정의를 이루실 것이다

sentences.original_text: when he sees that they are weak
and very few of them remain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 중 아직 남은 자가 매우 적을 때
